basic.description: This course focuses on program evaluation as applied sociology, including program theory, and will provide a practical understanding of how social research methods are used to assess social intervention programs.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Program Evaluation

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereq: Level 4 & reg in SOCY MAJ or MED & (a min grade of C in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226 & SOCY227) & (a min GPA of 2.60 in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226, SOCY227 & (a min GPA of 2.60 in all units in SOCY).
